findings.title: 제드 언짱 프로으기입을 문석입습니는
findings.description: Minter can call the _KIP7Mintable#mint()_ function to mint tokens without any restrictions.

findings.title: 조레어 Event 가 작업을 수합.
findings.description: The functions mint, burn, and burnFrom are missing events. This makes it difficult to track changes in real-time on the blockchain and verify the correctness of values. It is recommended to add corresponding events for these functions.
